title: Did Michigan Sen. Mike Shirkey Suggest Capitol Riot Was ‘Hoax’ in Leaked Video?
subtitle: The local Michigan GOP censured Shirkey for pushing false conspiracy theories.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: During a lunch with leaders of the Hillsdale County Republican Party held on Feb. 3, 2021, Michigan state Senate Majority Leader Mike Shirkey suggested that the Jan. 6 riot at the U.S. Capitol was a “hoax.”
